title: Mordekaiser [Q] damage
body:
Hi,

just now I played ADC when the enemy had a Mordekaiser.
We pretty much won the lane and I easily picked up the enemy support, then I faced Mordekaiser.
I've been fed, 1 level higher(me 11, he 10) than him and he only had Hextech Gunblade and an Aether Wisp so far.
He then used one [E], which made me have about 3/4 HP.
Next second he onehitted me. Recap said his [Q] dealt 1,2k magic damage with one hit, the rest of my HP have been taken away by his previous [E], which was approx. 1/4 of my HP.
I was kinda surprised, because I remembered his [Q] is a 3 hit spell now, which I remembered not to be that strong, especially because he didn't have any kind of a Sheen proc. 
Anyway, he killed me with 3/4 HP and one 1 Q(the first strike), obviously.

What's that?
I mean, I heard Mordekaiser is strong by now, but 1,2k dmg with the first hit of this [Q] spell, that has a max CD of 10s, seems pretty weird to me.
Especially when being level 10 and not fed at all.

Anyway, that left me with jaw dropped and confused.
Was that some kind of bug, that I should report, or is that normal?

Just curious! {{item:2050}}

replies.body: Der erste Hit sollte extrem wenig Schaden machen, so ca aa+20,30 oder so, der zweite hit ist dann der erste x 3 und der dritte hit ist dann op, nämlich der zweite nochmal x 3. Es kann gut sein dass er das gegen Minions aufgebaut hat und dich dann nur einmal, mit dem letzten Hit, getroffen hat.

Why are there currently so many people that see a hole website in german, press two buttons also with german language and than still thinking they are at the english board?

Oder Variante Nummer 2: Warum glauben Leute das jemand der kein Deutsch kann auch nur einen Blick ins deutsche Forum wirft, in der Hoffnung da irgendjemanden zu finden der zufällig einen Thread in Englisch erstellt hat?

Naja, ich habe das Forum über google geöffnet, und das erstbeste genommen.
Und bisher war das meistens ein englisches.
